channel.title: Deep Learning for Spatial and Spatio-Temporal Statistics
channel.description: Recent content on Deep Learning for Spatial and Spatio-Temporal Statistics

item.title: Contact
item.description: For more information on the project, please contact me using any of the below: Address: School of Mathematics and Applied Statistics, University of Wollongong NSW 2522, Australia E-mail: azm [at] uow.edu.au Twitter: @andrewzm Phone: +61 0242215112 If you would like to keep up to date with my research, subscribe to my blog on my personal web page.

item.title: Publications
item.description: The following is a list of publications on work was partially or fully supported by Australian Research Council (ARC) Discovery Early Career Research Award (DECRA) DE180100203. 2021 A. Zammit-Mangion, M. Bertolacci, J. Fisher, A. Stavert, M. Rigby, Y. Cao and N. Cressie (2021), “WOMBAT: A fully Bayesian global flux-inversion framework,” in press with Geophysical Model Development. S. Chuter, A. Zammit-Mangion, J. Rougier, G. Dawson, and J.

item.title: Collaborators and Students
item.description:
Collaborators Noel Cressie Distinguished Professor at the University of Wollongong, Australia
Nicholas Deutscher Senior Research Fellow at the University of Wollongong, Australia
Maurizio Filippone AXA Chair of Computational Statistics and Associate Professor at EURECOM, France
Raphaël Huser Assistant Professor at the King Abdullah University of Science and Technology, Saudi Arabia
